name: SPACE SHIPPER
description:
STORY

You are a space shipper in the juicy way galaxy. Because of your past, people are after you. This is why your only choice is to leave the galaxy for good. But to achieve that you'll need money. Exactly 500 zCoins. This is why you should transport cargos nonstop. Whatever happens , whoever you come across to, you have to get that money ASAP. After you've deposited 500 on your bank account, you're good to go.

HUJAM

This game was created by Biax & Eceti for "Space" themed HUJAM 22 with Unity in 72 hours

 GAMEPLAY

W &  S

You can Thrust forward or back with W and S.

O

For opening the order tab.

MODIFICATIONS

With the modifications that you buy from the mechanic, you can dominate your enemies.

Ship Defence (LeftMouseButton):

With clicking the LeftMouseButton you will be able to shoot.

Horizontal Moves (A & D):

With A and D keys you can horizontally move your ship.

Super Thruster (LeftShift):

With clicking the left shit you can send your ship to the infinty and beyond.

Premium Brakes(Space):

With clicking the Space you can instantly stop your vehicle.

GPS (M):

With M key you can toggle on and off your new map.

 TEAM

Game Developer and Coder  🎮 :  Biax

2D Graphics 👾 : Biax , eceti

Ses Efektleri, Ambiyans ve Müzikler 🎷 :  eceti

VFX and Animations : Biax

All of the assests have been used in the game was created by us in the time of the jam.
